description:
Be as sure-footed as you are gung-ho. With aggressive traction, stainless steel crampons and secure Wrapp Swift bindings, the Montane Snowshoes are designed for mountaineering or off-trail snowshoeing on steep and icy slopes.

  • Aluminum Reactiv™ frame changes shape for greater stiffness where you need it
  • Nytex decking resists abrasion, withstands cold temperatures and sheds snow
  • Spring-loaded™ suspension holds the snowshoes close underfoot to move freely, absorb impact, and flex naturally
  • All-Trac™ crampons have wider traction tabs on the sides and corners in addition to the sharp points on the front and rear
  • Wrapp™ Swift bindings have comfortable EVA padding and easy-to-use cinch straps
  • Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill
name: Atlas Montane Snowshoes - Unisex
